Description

I'm a solo developer and go to high school. I'd like to become a professional game developer one day and make games as a job.

History

I learned scratch in elementary school, which sparked my interest in game development. That's when I made my first games with visual code. When I got my first computer I started using Gamemaker Studio 2 and learned it's programming language to make games. After 1 year of learning, I decided to make a commercial game and started putting a lot of time and effort in it. I'm still working on that same game. I'm currently trying to make Marketing.
